berita: In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles to the point that the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has resurfaced. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Usually it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? How to check: Look at the package, if it's made of bristles, then it's made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. The risk of using what is haram: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, and spread food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various grilled or grilled meats and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at the salon or barbershop, washing skirmish clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know what the brushes & brushes you are using come from? Most likely FROM A FIRE FUR! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally come from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, SUCH AS MARKETS, PAINTING TOOLS SHOP, BUILDING MATERIALS STORE, MAKE UP TOOLS & SALON SHOP, ONLINE STORE, ETC. ARE YOU FAMILIAR WITH THE MULTIPLE FORMS BELOW? THERE ARE PAINTING BRUSH, WALL PAINT BRUSH, MAKE UP BRUSH, HAIR BRUSH, BARBER/BARBER BRUSH, CLOTHING BRUSH, ETC. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID USE BRUSHS AND BONES BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, with slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, as well as knives & spatulas for greasing food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT THE PROCESS OF COOKING AND CLEANING Utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. Usually, pig hair brushes are sold in WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, manufacturers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then dyeing them, so it looks like the hair of other animals. (AND) Share this info with your family and friends so that more people can read it so you can avoid products that are not halalhopefully it will be useful
berita_id: Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi hingga MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul kembali.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle"."Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Bagaimana cara memeriksa: Lihatlah paket itu, jika terbuat dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti doa dan doa yang disingkirkan. TETAP RAIK. Tapi jika ada yang meleleh dan menjadi keras, itu berarti itu berarti itu digunakan dan ada yang aman.lebih layak (hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang -orang yang kita cintai.Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian pertempuran, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda dari apa kuas & kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari bulu api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, alat make up & toko salon, toko online, dll.Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah ini?Ada kuas lukisan, sikat cat dinding, kuas make up, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur/tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll.AWAS!Tips Hindari menggunakan kuas dan tulang sikat: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, serta pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang proses memasak dan membersihkan peralatan menggunakan sikat babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya, kuas rambut babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, jadi sepertinya rambut hewan lain.(Dan) bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman Anda sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal ... semoga bermanfaat

berita: One of the minimarkets on Jalan Denai, Tribune, got an Oral B brand toothbrush made of Bristles. From the search results on google Bristles means sea urchin. Knowing this, the tribune went to the North Sumatra Health Office, but the Head of the Health Office was not present and the head of the division was also not present, the other staff did not want to be interviewed about whether or not Bristles were sea urchins. Meanwhile, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016) He added, if proven MUI will publish to the public so as not to use the toothbrush. In addition, MUI will withdraw the product from inch the market.
berita_id: Salah satu minimarket di Jalan Denai, Tribune, mendapat sikat gigi merek B yang terbuat dari bulu.Dari hasil pencarian di Google Bristles berarti landak laut.Mengetahui hal ini, Tribune pergi ke Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, tetapi kepala Kantor Kesehatan tidak ada dan kepala divisi juga tidak ada, staf lain tidak ingin diwawancarai tentang apakah bulu landak laut atau tidak.Sementara itu, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui seluler, Senin (7/3/2016) ia menambahkan, jika MUI yang terbukti akan diterbitkan kepada publik agar tidak menggunakan sikat gigi.Selain itu, MUI akan menarik produk dari Inch the Market.

berita: Thousands of people who were going to take part in the 212 Action, from various areas, were detained in front of the courtyard of the Istiqlal mosque in Central Jakarta. Our monitoring Tuesday at 04.00. Wib (21/2/2017) saw dozens of inter-city buses parked on the side of the bull field in front of the Istiqlal mosque fence which dropped thousands of participants from the 212 Action. They felt strange because they were not allowed to enter the mosque even though they were going to perform the Fajr prayer. One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview "We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, it is forbidden to worship in the mosque gently with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we as devout Muslims must carry out worship , try to think that the mosque inside is empty, we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin to us in a high tone. The 212 Defend Islam Action Volume 2 will be held at the dawn prayer, the participants of the action began to arrive who are planning to walk to the DPR building, it is estimated that player around 50,000 people or even more. Polda Metro Jaya has given permission for the 212 Action today starting at 07.00 until 18.00.Wib, thousands of Police and TNI personnel were deployed to secure this action.
berita_id: Ribuan orang yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi 212, dari berbagai daerah, ditahan di depan halaman Masjid Istiqlal di Jakarta Tengah.Pemantauan kami Selasa pukul 04.00.WIB (21/2/2017) melihat lusinan bus antar kota yang diparkir di sisi lapangan banteng di depan pagar masjid Istiqlal yang menjatuhkan ribuan peserta dari aksi 212.Mereka merasa aneh karena mereka tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid meskipun mereka akan melakukan doa Fajr.One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview "We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, it is forbidden to worship in the mosque gently with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we as devout Muslims must carry out worship , try to think that the mosque inside is empty, we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin tokami dengan nada tinggi.The 212 Defend Islam Action Volume 2 akan diadakan pada doa fajar, para peserta tindakan mulai berdatangan yang berencana berjalan ke gedung DPR, diperkirakan bahwa pemain sekitar 50.000 orang atau bahkan lebih.Polda Metro Jaya telah memberikan izin untuk 212 tindakan hari ini mulai pukul 07.00 hingga 18.00.WIB, ribuan polisi dan personel TNI dikerahkan untuk mengamankan tindakan ini.

berita: Liputan1.com, News The 212 Action Mass could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque Hoax This was conveyed by the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, who denied that they had locked the Istiqlal Mosque for the mass 212 demonstrations that would continue to take action in front of the DPR/MPR Building. "A thousand percent hoax," said Abu when contacted, Tuesday (21/2/2017). Abu said, according to the standard operating procedures at the Istiqlal Mosque, the doors of the Istiqlal Mosque were closed at 21.30 WIB and would be reopened one hour before the dawn prayer. "Outside the fasting month, the Isha prayer ends, around 21.30 WIB according to the law, it is closed, sterile. Then it is opened again one hour before dawn. That is outside the fasting month," he explained. According to him, last night's incident only five buses from East Java that will take part in the 212 action. "They entered after Isha, then they were given the opportunity to pray and clean up, have a good talk with the chairman, we gave understanding, and thank God they understood traverse and left istiqlal properly. volunteer," he said. He reiterated that there were no crowds who were not allowed to enter the Istiqlal Mosque, according to him, this issue was not true at all. "The intruders are the people who wrote accusing the PKI. Except for Axis 212, 411, which we expelled the day before and it was an emergency. There was no coordination, unlike the previous actions," he said.
berita_id: LIPUTAN1.com, Berita Misa aksi 212 tidak dapat memasuki tipuan masjid Istiqlal ini disampaikan oleh bagian protokol masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, yang membantah bahwa mereka telah mengunci masjid Istiqlal untuk pembangunan MASS 212 yang akan terus mengambil tindakan di depan DPR/MPR."Seribu persen tipuan," kata Abu ketika dihubungi, Selasa (21/2/2017).Abu mengatakan, menurut prosedur operasi standar di Masjid Istiqlal, pintu masjid Istiqlal ditutup pada 21.30 WIB dan akan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar."Di luar bulan puasa, doa Isha berakhir, sekitar 21.30 WIB menurut hukum, ditutup, steril. Kemudian dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum fajar. Itu di luar bulan puasa," jelasnya.Menurutnya, insiden tadi malam hanya lima bus dari Jawa Timur yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi 212."Mereka masuk setelah Isha, maka mereka diberi kesempatan untuk berdoa dan membersihkan, berbicara dengan baik dengan ketua, kami memberi pengertian, dan bersyukur kepada Tuhan mereka mengerti melintasi dan meninggalkan Istiqlal dengan benar. Relawan," katanya.Dia menegaskan bahwa tidak ada kerumunan yang tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid Istiqlal, menurutnya, masalah ini tidak benar sama sekali."Para penyusup adalah orang -orang yang menulis menuduh PKI. Kecuali untuk Axis 212, 411, yang kami ungkapkan sehari sebelumnya dan itu adalah keadaan darurat. Tidak ada koordinasi, tidak seperti tindakan sebelumnya," katanya.

berita: Buleleng Police Narcotics Unit officers together with the Buleleng Industry and Trade Office conducted raids on several candy traders in schools in the Singaraja city area, on Thursday (9/3) morning. This raid was based on the rising circulation of issues on social media stating that candy shaped like a baby pacifier, containing drugs is currently ab initio circulating throughout Indonesia. The allegation of the pacifier containing drugs initially occurred in Central Java. This information suddenly made the Buleleng Police officer furious. To prove the reality, they also conducted raids while socializing in several locations such as SDN 3 and 4 Banjar Jawa, SDN 1 Banjar Tegal, SDN 1, 2, and 5 Banyuasri. The Head of Narcotics at the Buleleng Police, AKP I Ketut Adnyana, said that until now, candy pacifiers in Buleleng had not been found. However, it still asks all students, school teachers and the community to remain vigilant. If anyone sees a candy pacifier that says hard candy, please let us know immediately. This is because the dot-shaped candy contains a drug substance, which if consumed will cause addiction. If it is found, we will immediately take it for a lab check, he explained in front of all the students of SDN 3 and 4 Banjar Jawa, Singaraja. From field observations, until 10.32 WITA, alert notices had been posted in school canteens by officers from the Buleleng Police Narcotics Unit and the Buleleng Industry and Trade Office.
berita_id: Petugas Unit Narkotika Polisi Buleleng bersama -sama dengan industri Buleleng dan kantor perdagangan melakukan penggerebekan pada beberapa pedagang permen di sekolah -sekolah di daerah Kota Singaraja, pada hari Kamis (9/3) pagi.Penggerebekan ini didasarkan pada meningkatnya sirkulasi masalah di media sosial yang menyatakan bahwa permen berbentuk seperti dot bayi, yang mengandung obat -obatan saat ini beredar di seluruh Indonesia.Tuduhan dot yang mengandung obat -obatan awalnya terjadi di Jawa Tengah.Informasi ini tiba -tiba membuat petugas polisi Buleleng marah.Untuk membuktikan kenyataan, mereka juga melakukan penggerebekan sambil bersosialisasi di beberapa lokasi seperti SDN 3 dan 4 Banjar Jawa, Sdn 1 Banjar Tegal, Sdn 1, 2, dan 5 Banyuasri.Kepala narkotika di Polisi Buleleng, AKP I Ketut Adnyana, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang, dot permen di Buleleng belum ditemukan.Namun, masih meminta semua siswa, guru sekolah dan masyarakat untuk tetap waspada."Jika ada yang melihat dot permen yang mengatakan permen keras, tolong beri tahu kami segera. Ini karena permen berbentuk titik berisi zat obat, yang jika dikonsumsi akan menyebabkan kecanduan. Jika ditemukan, kami akan segera menerimanya untuk pemeriksaan lab," jelasnya di depan semua siswa SDN 3 dan 4 Banjar Jawa, Singaraja.Dari pengamatan lapangan, hingga 10.32 Wita, pemberitahuan peringatan telah diposting di kantin sekolah oleh petugas dari Unit Narkotika Polisi Buleleng dan industri dan kantor perdagangan Buleleng.

berita: The crowds were not seen in a number of mosques, such as the Istiqlal Mosque, Central Jakarta, and the Al Azhar Grand Mosque, South Jakarta, early Tuesday before dawn prayers, related to the planned peaceful demonstration of the 212 Volume II Action. This condition is also estimated to be the impact of heavy rains that have hit the DKI Jakarta area and its surroundings since around 03.00 WIB, which resulted in a number of roads being surrounded by puddles, as observed by Antara Tuesday morning. The participants of Action 212 volume II tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque with the intention of carrying out the Fajr prayer in congregation, and also the weather conditions when this news was revealed were raining, photo as a result they tried to immediately enter shelter while waiting for the time for prayer to come. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal Mosque is actually tightly closed, as received by this media, in the form of photos and descriptions, 5 minutes later when this news was revealed, the participants were also unable to enter to gather and perform the dawn prayer.
berita_id: Kerumunan tidak terlihat di sejumlah masjid, seperti Masjid Istiqlal, Jakarta Tengah, dan Masjid Grand Al Azhar, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa pagi sebelum doa fajar, terkait dengan demonstrasi damai yang direncanakan dari aksi 212 Volume II.Kondisi ini juga diperkirakan merupakan dampak hujan lebat yang telah menghantam daerah DKI Jakarta dan sekitarnya sejak sekitar pukul 03.00 WIB, yang mengakibatkan sejumlah jalan dikelilingi oleh genangan air, seperti yang diamati oleh Antara Selasa pagi.Para peserta aksi 212 Volume II mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal dengan maksud untuk melaksanakan doa Fajr di jemaat, dan juga kondisi cuaca ketika berita ini terungkap hujan, foto sebagai hasilnya mereka mencoba untuk segera memasuki tempat berlindung sambil menunggu waktu untuk berdoa.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal sebenarnya ditutup rapat, seperti yang diterima oleh media ini, dalam bentuk foto dan deskripsi, 5 menit kemudian ketika berita ini terungkap, para peserta juga tidak dapat masuk untuk berkumpul dan melakukan doa fajar.

berita: On social networks, there is a lot of information circulating that calls catfish the filthiest fish. In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3,000 cancer cells. the nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish that likes to consume all kinds of waste in the waters. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. This fish is equipped with an additional breathing apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, so that it can survive in muddy or even polluted water conditions. Presumably, this is what raises the suspicion about the accumulation of carcinogenic toxins (cancer causing) in the body of catfish. Investigation: catfish circulating in the market do not come from the wild. Many catfish are cultivated in ponds, which should be controlled so that they are free from pollution. The feed given can also be chosen, inch not having to rely on waste. The number of catfish production also continues to increase every year. Data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP) shows that catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. According to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS), catfish consumption was 29.98 kg/capita/year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. In Jakarta, no less than 6,000 pecel catfish stalls have been registered with the Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI). Regarding the nutritional content, it is undeniable that catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. The fact that catfish is also low in cholesterol is likely to drown out accusations that catfish can cause cancer. Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K)Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association, said that until now there has been no research that says eating catfish can trigger cancer. Conclusion: A mouthful of catfish containing 3,000 cancer cells is not true or a hoax.
berita_id: Di jejaring sosial, ada banyak informasi yang beredar yang menyebut ikan Catfish sebagai ikan paling kotor.Dalam seteguk daging lele, ada 3.000 sel kanker.Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengkonsumsi semua jenis limbah di perairan.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Ikan ini dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, sehingga dapat bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air berlumpur atau bahkan tercemar.Agaknya, inilah yang menimbulkan kecurigaan tentang akumulasi racun karsinogenik (penyebab kanker) dalam tubuh ikan lele.Investigasi: Ikan lele yang beredar di pasar tidak datang dari alam liar.Banyak ikan lele yang dibudidayakan di kolam, yang harus dikendalikan sehingga mereka bebas dari polusi.Umpan yang diberikan juga dapat dipilih, inci tidak harus mengandalkan limbah.Jumlah produksi ikan lele juga terus meningkat setiap tahun.Data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP) shows that catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. According to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS), catfish consumption was 29.98 kg/capita/year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. InJakarta, tidak kurang dari 6.000 kios ikan lele Pecel telah terdaftar di Asosiasi Pejabat Jalanan Indonesia (APKLI).Mengenai kandungan nutrisi, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa ikan lele adalah sumber protein berharga yang murah.Fakta bahwa ikan lele juga rendah kolesterol cenderung menenggelamkan tuduhan bahwa ikan lele dapat menyebabkan kanker.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang belum ada penelitian yang mengatakan makan ikan lele dapat memicu kanker.Kesimpulan: Sepembuk ikan lele yang mengandung 3.000 sel kanker tidak benar atau tipuan.

berita: The Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno LP Marsudi, confirmed that sunburn the news that Reog Ponorogo was deliberately set on fire at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) office in Davao, Philippines, was not entirely true. "Reog and gamelan decorations in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and infested with termites," said Retno via text message, Saturday, October 31, 2015. For information, several media had published news stating that officials at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao allowed these individuals to burn the cultural products of the Indonesian people because they were considered to be worshiping idols. It was reported that the Reog and the dragon headdress were burned on 20 October 2015 in the courtyard of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao with the help of two security guards. Nevertheless, Foreign Minister Retno clarified the contents of the news. "Reog has been damaged so it has nothing to do with the notion of worshiping idols," said Retno.
berita_id: Menteri Luar Negeri Indonesia, Retno LP Marsudi, mengkonfirmasi bahwa matahari terbakar berita bahwa Reog Ponorogo sengaja dibakar di Kantor Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Davao, Filipina, tidak sepenuhnya benar."Dekorasi Reog dan Gamelan dalam bentuk Naga Kepala dibakar karena mereka rusak dan terinfeksi rayap," kata Retno melalui pesan teks, Sabtu, 31 Oktober 2015. Untuk informasi, beberapa media telah menerbitkan berita yang menyatakan bahwa pejabat di konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao mengizinkan orang -orang ini untuk membakar produk budaya dari orang -orang Indonesia karena mereka dipertimbangkan oleh orang -orang di Indonesia.Dilaporkan bahwa REOG dan HEADDRESS Naga dibakar pada 20 Oktober 2015 di halaman Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dengan bantuan dua penjaga keamanan.Namun demikian, Menteri Luar Negeri Retno mengklarifikasi isi berita tersebut."Reog telah rusak sehingga tidak ada hubungannya dengan gagasan menyembah berhala," kata Retno.

berita: Ahok is not dismissed as Governor of DKI Jakarta due to his status as a defendant in the case of blasphemy against Islam, shows how difficult the law in this country is to enforce. How can you seek justice if the law is a tool to seek justice alone is difficult to enforce. Not a few legal and state administration experts, including former Constitutional Court Justice Mahfud MD, criticized the steps taken by the government, especially the Minister of Home Affairs Tjahyo Kumolo and President Joko Widodo who remained silent when Ahok returned to the governorship, while several other regional heads were dismissed when their status was persist accused of an act. criminal. This eventually led to the demands of law enforcement through the actions of defending Islam and Defending the State carried out by the Muslim community who joined the FUI (Islamic Community Forum) today (Tuesday, 21/02/2017). In addition to the masses from FUI, there were also a number of students who were members of the student movement for people's defense. Their demands include dismissing the governor who is a suspect, stopping the criminalization of ulama, stopping the arrest of student activists, restoring the nation's sovereignty and returning it to the original 1945 Constitution. The action, which was held in front of the DPR-MPR Building, turned out to be attracting people from outside Jakarta. They tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque to pray Fajr in congregation and also when the weather was raining. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal mosque was tightly closed, even though it was approaching Fajr time. Fajr time. berita_id: Ahok tidak dipecat sebagai gubernur DKI Jakarta karena statusnya sebagai terdakwa dalam kasus penistaan terhadap Islam, menunjukkan betapa sulitnya hukum di negara ini untuk menegakkan.Bagaimana Anda bisa mencari keadilan jika hukum adalah alat untuk mencari keadilan saja sulit untuk ditegakkan.Tidak sedikit pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan pengadilan konstitusional Mahfud MD, mengkritik langkah -langkah yang diambil oleh pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri Tjahyo Kumolo dan Presiden Joko Widodo yang tetap diam ketika Ahok kembali ke gubernur, sementara beberapa kepala regional lainnya diberhentikan ketika status mereka tetap diduga sebagai sebuah tindakan.pidana.Hal ini akhirnya mengarah pada tuntutan penegakan hukum melalui tindakan membela Islam dan mempertahankan negara yang dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim yang bergabung dengan FUI (Forum Komunitas Islam) hari ini (Selasa, 21/02/2017).Selain massa dari Fui, ada juga sejumlah siswa yang merupakan anggota gerakan siswa untuk pertahanan rakyat.Tuntutan mereka termasuk memecat gubernur yang merupakan tersangka, menghentikan kriminalisasi ulama, menghentikan penangkapan aktivis mahasiswa, memulihkan kedaulatan negara dan mengembalikannya ke konstitusi asli 1945.Aksi, yang diadakan di depan gedung DPR-MPR, ternyata menarik orang dari luar Jakarta.Mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal untuk berdoa Fajr di jemaat dan juga ketika cuaca hujan.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal tertutup rapat, meskipun mendekati waktu fajr.Waktu fajr.Menurut laporan dari salah satu kontributor Gabbarberita.com di lapangan, masjid baru dibuka pada sekitar pukul 04.00 WIB.Sebelumnya di mana manajemen BPPMI dan ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.

berita: Here's a photo of the easily curved iPhone 6 circulating on the Internet. As quoted from Mashable, Wednesday (24/9/2014), a member of the MacRumors forum shared a photo of his curved iPhone 6 Plus. Hanzon, the member's name, admitted that he kept the iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket while driving. After a few hours of pocketing, Hanzon found the iPhone 6 had changed shape, the center was slightly curved. A similar case was also reported by a member of the MacRumors forum, DevinPitcher. He said that his colleague's iPhone 6 Plus also curved after being pocketed in the front pocket of his pants. A photo of the curved iPhone 6 was also posted by Devin in a thread. A post on the picture French forum, MacBidouille, also reported a similar case. Members of this forum also included a photo of a colleague's iPhone 6 that was bent just because it was placed in the front pocket of his pants. This crooked case is not the first to happen. Earlier this year, several iPhone 5S owners reported that their phones were curved even though they weren't impacted and also didn't sit in their back pockets or sit down. Meanwhile, in 2012, several iPhone 5 users claimed to experience such cases on their devices.
berita_id: Berikut adalah foto iPhone 6 yang mudah melengkung yang beredar di internet.Seperti dikutip dari Mashable, Rabu (24/9/2014), seorang anggota Forum Macrumors membagikan foto iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung.Hanzon, nama anggota, mengakui bahwa ia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depannya saat mengemudi.Setelah beberapa jam mengantongi, Hanzon menemukan iPhone 6 telah berubah bentuk, pusatnya sedikit melengkung.Kasus serupa juga dilaporkan oleh anggota Forum Macrumors, Devinpitcher.Dia mengatakan bahwa iPhone 6 Plus rekannya juga melengkung setelah dikenakan di saku depan celananya.Foto iPhone 6 melengkung juga diposting oleh Devin di utas.Sebuah posting di Forum Prancis Picture, MacBidouille, juga melaporkan kasus serupa.Anggota forum ini juga menyertakan foto iPhone 6 kolega yang ditekuk hanya karena ditempatkan di saku depan celananya.Kasus bengkok ini bukan yang pertama terjadi.Awal tahun ini, beberapa pemilik iPhone 5S melaporkan bahwa ponsel mereka melengkung meskipun mereka tidak terpengaruh dan juga tidak duduk di saku belakang atau duduk.Sementara itu, pada tahun 2012, beberapa pengguna iPhone 5 mengklaim mengalami kasus seperti itu di perangkat mereka.

berita: The current Pokemon Go game has attracted so much interest from the world community. The excitement of hunting monsters makes people willing to go around the place to complete the Pokemon collection. However, the outbreak of the game fever also cannot be separated from the slanted issues that are scattered. Pokemon has been plagued by negative news about the game. For example, recently, there has been a link circulating on social media that says Pokemon has a negative meaning and corners one religion. Many circulating on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". This of course raises the pros and cons and becomes a heated debate on social media. hence Many believe and share the rumor, many think it's just a fittology. Is it true what is spread on social media? Here's the answer. When the Pokemon cartoons were on the rise in the early 2000s, the Los Angeles Times had issued a report on this issue in the April 24, 2001 issue. At that time, countries located in the Middle East had indeed had a problem with it. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, rumors circulated that Pokemon games had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. Nintendo of course denied this, but the leaders of these countries still can not accept Pokemon. The rumor arose amid concerns that Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture; Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, a former member of the Jordanian parliament said that this toy is part of a Jewish plan to corrupt the minds of our young generation because it offends blasphemous thoughts, mocks God and our moral values so that it is very dangerous for the younger generation. Meanwhile, Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no strong evidence that confirmed the rumors that made parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon game. In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. This of course causes anxiety. He said if he had even asked directly to the party who popularized Pokemon. Pokemon is actually just an abbreviation of Pocket Monster or pocket monster. Named Pocket Monster because this pokemon has a pocket ball that can be put in a pocket. Meanwhile Pikachu is a combination of the words Pika and Chu. Pika is the name of an animal that is still in the same family as rabbits, while Chu in Japanese means squeak. So here, JBers, the naming of Pokemon and Pikachu actually has nothing to do with religion at all. Especially to corner certain religions, yes. As long as you play properly and keep your priorities in mind, such as worship, work and study, it's definitely okay to hunt Pokemon!
berita_id: Game Pokemon Go saat ini telah menarik begitu banyak minat dari komunitas dunia.Kegembiraan berburu monster membuat orang mau berkeliling tempat untuk menyelesaikan koleksi Pokemon.Namun, pecahnya demam permainan juga tidak dapat dipisahkan dari masalah miring yang tersebar.Pokemon telah terganggu oleh berita negatif tentang permainan.Sebagai contoh, baru -baru ini, ada tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang mengatakan Pokemon memiliki makna negatif dan menyentuh satu agama.Banyak yang beredar di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Ini tentu saja meningkatkan pro dan kontra dan menjadi perdebatan sengit di media sosial.Oleh karena itu banyak yang percaya dan berbagi rumor, banyak yang berpikir itu hanya fitologi.Benarkah apa yang tersebar di media sosial?Inilah jawabannya.Ketika kartun Pokemon sedang meningkat di awal 2000 -an, Los Angeles Times telah mengeluarkan laporan tentang masalah ini dalam edisi 24 April 2001.Pada saat itu, negara -negara yang berlokasi di Timur Tengah memang memiliki masalah dengannya.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, desas-desus beredar bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Nintendo tentu saja membantah ini, tetapi para pemimpin negara -negara ini masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran bahwa negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul;Sheik Abdel Monem Abu Zent, mantan anggota parlemen Yordania mengatakan bahwa mainan ini adalah bagian dari rencana Yahudi untuk merusak pikiran generasi muda kita karena menyinggung pikiran yang menghembuskan pikiran, mengejek Tuhan dan nilai -nilai moral kita sehingga sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda.Sementara itu, Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat yang mengkonfirmasi rumor yang membuat orang tua melarang anak -anak mereka untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon.Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya berakar pada Syria kuno dan menghina Islam.Pejabat gereja mengatakan mereka terkejut dengan surat yang masuk yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.Dia mengatakan apakah dia bahkan bertanya langsung kepada pesta yang mempopulerkan Pokemon.Pokemon sebenarnya hanya singkatan dari monster saku atau monster saku.Named Pocket Monster karena Pokemon ini memiliki bola saku yang dapat dimasukkan ke dalam saku.Sementara itu Pikachu adalah kombinasi dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Pika adalah nama hewan yang masih berada di keluarga yang sama dengan kelinci, sementara Chu dalam bahasa Jepang berarti mencicit.Jadi di sini, Jbers, penamaan Pokemon dan Pikachu sebenarnya tidak ada hubungannya dengan agama sama sekali.Terutama untuk menyudutkan agama -agama tertentu, ya.Selama Anda bermain dengan benar dan mengingat prioritas Anda, seperti ibadah, pekerjaan dan belajar, tidak apa -apa untuk berburu Pokemon!

berita: In the aftermath of the iPhone Plus news that complained of bending easily, Apple responded by inviting several journalists to see the process of testing the strength of the psychometric test iPhone 6 Plus in its laboratory. In the latest iPhone testing video, Apple confirmed to make the latest iPhone, doing some testing. It's not enough just one time, but several times testing. This is to ensure as well as convince iPhone lovers, if Apple is not playing games in bringing innovation to the latest iPhone. Launching Recode.net, Friday, September 26 2014, the first test is called "sit test". At this stage, it is a test of the latest iPhone with a simulation of the device being loaded with a certain weight. Apple described this sit test, the iPhone 6 Plus was occupied by an adult. In the video, the iPhone 6 Plus looks reliable, without any flaws or damage. Apple's senior vice president of hardware engineering, Dan Riccio, said: "This test is one of the most relevant ways to demonstrate customer concerns that the iPhone will break easily when placed in a pocket. Riccio insists Apple conducted this test "thousands of times". Furthermore, the second test is called the three-point bend test. At this stage, the iPhone is loaded with a weight of up to 25 kilograms. Still the same, the iPhone is still strong, not bent. The next test is the pressure point test. At this stage, Apple weighed 10 kg on the iPhone at one point. Finally, Apple tests its products with a torsion or twist test. Seen in this test facility, the iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, and MacBook Pro rotate through both ends that have been locked.
berita_id: Setelah berita iPhone Plus yang mengeluh membungkuk dengan mudah, Apple merespons dengan mengundang beberapa jurnalis untuk melihat proses pengujian kekuatan uji psikometrik iPhone 6 Plus di laboratoriumnya.Dalam video pengujian iPhone terbaru, Apple mengkonfirmasi untuk membuat iPhone terbaru, melakukan beberapa pengujian.Ini tidak cukup hanya satu kali, tetapi beberapa kali pengujian.Ini untuk memastikan serta meyakinkan pecinta iPhone, jika Apple tidak bermain game dalam membawa inovasi ke iPhone terbaru.Meluncurkan Recode.net, Jumat, 26 September 2014, tes pertama disebut "tes duduk".Pada tahap ini, ini adalah uji iPhone terbaru dengan simulasi perangkat yang dimuat dengan bobot tertentu.Apple menggambarkan tes duduk ini, iPhone 6 Plus ditempati oleh orang dewasa.Dalam video, iPhone 6 Plus terlihat dapat diandalkan, tanpa kekurangan atau kerusakan.Wakil Presiden Senior Teknik Perangkat Keras Apple, Dan Riccio, mengatakan: "Tes ini adalah salah satu cara yang paling relevan untuk menunjukkan kekhawatiran pelanggan bahwa iPhone akan mudah rusak ketika ditempatkan di saku. Riccio menegaskan Apple melakukan tes ini" ribuan kali ". Tidak ada bobotnya.Tes berikutnya adalah Tes Titik Tekanan.

berita: Jakarta  The Reog Ponorogo Community (KRP) submitted files on the Reog Ponorogo burning incident at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao - Philippines to the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu), as a follow-up to an Open Letter submitted to the Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs (Menlu) on 2 November 2015 then. Upon the submission of the files, the Reog Ponorogo Community was immediately received by the Foreign Minister, Retno LP Marsudi. In the meeting which took place in the Foreign Minister's Meeting Room, Jalan Pejambon 6, Central Jakarta, the KRP submitted files in the form of photos of the procession of burning reog, photos of reog artists who appeared at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao in 2005, copies of the clarifications from the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia, copies of the apology from the Indonesian Consulate General staff, names of people which must be checked by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Team, and other files. "We will escort the team formed by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs so that it runs openly, transparently and with honesty. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs' sensitivity to the reog burning incident at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao is eagerly awaited by Reog activists and lovers," said Secretary of the Reog Ponorogo Community (KRP), M Syaiful Jihad here. Jakarta, Monday (9/11/2015), in a press release. According to Syaiful Jihad, the incident of burning National Cultural Heritage assets at the Consulate General in Davao must be resolved legally, both criminally and civilly, so that the "intellectual actor" is revealed. In addition, there must be protection and security guarantees for Indonesian citizens in Davao, especially Indonesian citizens who have exposed this incident. "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs must be held accountable," he said. On that occasion, Foreign Minister Retno LP Marsudi, accompanied by the Director General of Information and Public Diplomacy, Esti Andayani, asked the KRP to calm the reaction of the people who love Reog, and understand the spiritual atmosphere of reog lovers, as well as no attempt to disrespect culture because it has been inherent in diplomats. "An internal audit has been carried out by the Consulate General in Davao, while an external audit has been carried out by the Inspectorate General, in the form of a team to find out what actually happened at the Consulate General in Davao, the progress and results will be open and accessible to the public," said Retno, while asking to prioritize the principles presumption of innocence and carried out according to applicable procedures. "We also guarantee that Indonesian citizens who are in Davao City, including alien those who report the reog burning incident, will not happen, let alone violence. We guarantee their safety," concluded Foreign Minister Retno.
berita_id: Jakarta - Komunitas Reog Ponorogo (KRP) mengajukan file -file tentang insiden pembakaran Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao - Filipina ke Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia (Kemlu), sebagai tindak lanjut dari surat terbuka yang diajukan kepada Menteri Luar Negeri Indonesia (Menlu) pada 2 November 2015.Setelah pengajuan file, komunitas Reog Ponorogo segera diterima oleh Menteri Luar Negeri, Retno LP Marsudi.In the meeting which took place in the Foreign Minister's Meeting Room, Jalan Pejambon 6, Central Jakarta, the KRP submitted files in the form of photos of the procession of burning reog, photos of reog artists who appeared at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao in 2005, copies of the clarifications from the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia, copies of the apology from the Indonesian Consulate General staff, names of people which must beDiperiksa oleh tim Kementerian Luar Negeri, dan file lainnya."Kami akan mengawal tim yang dibentuk oleh Kementerian Luar Negeri sehingga berjalan secara terbuka, transparan, dan dengan kejujuran. Kejujuran Kementerian Luar Negeri terhadap insiden pembakaran yang ditentukan kembali di konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao dengan penuh semangat ditunggu -tunggu oleh aktivis dan kekasih yang reog," kata Sekretaris Reog Ponorogo (KRRP) di sini.Jakarta, Senin (9/11/2015), dalam siaran pers.Menurut Syaiful Jihad, insiden membakar aset warisan budaya nasional di konsulat jenderal di Davao harus diselesaikan secara hukum, baik secara kriminal maupun sipil, sehingga "aktor intelektual" terungkap.Selain itu, harus ada jaminan perlindungan dan keamanan untuk warga negara Indonesia di Davao, terutama warga negara Indonesia yang telah mengekspos insiden ini."Kementerian Luar Negeri harus dimintai pertanggungjawaban," katanya.Pada kesempatan itu, Menteri Luar Negeri Retno LP Marsudi, disertai oleh Direktur Jenderal Informasi dan Diplomasi Publik, Esti Andayani, meminta KRP untuk menenangkan reaksi orang -orang yang mencintai Reog, dan memahami suasana spiritual dari pecinta yang dirancang ulang, serta tidak ada upaya untuk tidak menghormati budaya karena telah melekat pada dipllomokat."Audit internal telah dilakukan oleh Konsulat Jenderal di Davao, sementara audit eksternal telah dilakukan oleh Jenderal Inspektorat, dalam bentuk tim untuk mengetahui apa yang sebenarnya terjadi di Konsulat Jenderal di Davao, kemajuan dan hasilnya akan terbuka dan diakses oleh publik," kata Retno, sementara meminta untuk memprioritaskan prinsip -prinsip Prinsip Penghancuran."Kami juga menjamin bahwa warga negara Indonesia yang berada di Kota Davao, termasuk orang asing yang melaporkan insiden pembakaran kembali, tidak akan terjadi, apalagi kekerasan. Kami menjamin keselamatan mereka," pungkas Menteri Luar Negeri Retno.

berita: The Regent of Lebak Iti Octavia Jayabaya appealed to the public to supervise their children in buying light snacks, especially candy in the form of pacifiers. This is because the candy is suspected to contain hazardous substances and its circulation has now begun to spread in Lebak. "Parents must also supervise their children, do not be careless in buying snacks. Moreover, we hear that there are candy snacks that contain dangerous substances," said Iti, Thursday (9/3/2017). As a measure to anticipate tally the circulation of the candy, said Iti, it will withdraw the distribution of the candy in the market. It will also conduct laboratory tests to check the substances contained in the candy. "We will do a laboratory test first. If there are hazardous substances, especially drugs, we will withdraw the circulation. Because the candy market is mostly children," he said. Meanwhile, the Head of the Lebak Industry and Trade Office, Hari Setiono, said that his party had distributed notices to the public to be wary of candy circulating without a clear label, especially candy allegedly containing drugs currently circulating in the market. "We continue to monitor so that the candy is no longer circulating in Lebak," he said
berita_id: Bupati Lebak Iti Octavia Jayabaya mengimbau publik untuk mengawasi anak -anak mereka dalam membeli makanan ringan, terutama permen dalam bentuk dot.Ini karena permen diduga mengandung zat berbahaya dan sirkulasi sekarang telah mulai menyebar di Lebak."Orang tua juga harus mengawasi anak -anak mereka, jangan ceroboh dalam membeli makanan ringan. Selain itu, kami mendengar bahwa ada camilan permen yang mengandung zat berbahaya," kata ITI, Kamis (9/3/2017).Sebagai langkah untuk mengantisipasi penghitungan sirkulasi permen, kata ITI, itu akan menarik distribusi permen di pasar.Ini juga akan melakukan tes laboratorium untuk memeriksa zat yang terkandung dalam permen."Kami akan melakukan tes laboratorium terlebih dahulu. Jika ada zat berbahaya, terutama obat -obatan, kami akan menarik sirkulasi. Karena pasar permen sebagian besar adalah anak -anak," katanya.Sementara itu, kepala industri dan kantor perdagangan Lebak, Hari Setiono, mengatakan bahwa partainya telah membagikan pemberitahuan kepada publik untuk waspada terhadap permen yang beredar tanpa label yang jelas, terutama permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan yang saat ini beredar di pasar."Kami terus memantau sehingga permen tidak lagi beredar di Lebak," katanya

berita: Two or more words that have the same form, but have different meanings in different languages cannot be underestimated (see also: Nokia Lumia What is the Meaning?). Many consequences arise due to the difference in meaning. There are quite a few examples. In Iraq, for example, Pokemon cartoons were banned during Saddam Hussein's reign. The cartoon was made in Japan and was broadcast in Indonesia through the television station MNC TV. The fact of the ban was revealed through an Iraqi state document confiscated by US troops in 2004. Serambinews.com, as quoted from the dailymirror, said that the reason for the ban was solely because of its negative meaning in the language in Iraq. In the document, Saddam received advice from the state intelligence agency that the names used in the Pokemon films could not be tolerated in underestimate Iraq. In Syriac, or in Indonesia it is better known as Syriac, the word 'Pokemon' is very similar to the same term in that language which means: 'I am Jewish'. Some of the characters in the Pokemon movies, when translated into Syriac, also have meanings that Saddam cannot accept. The main character of the Pokemon movie, namely Pikachu, has the meaning: 'Be a Jew'. Then, the character Charmander, has the meaning: 'God is Weak', in contrast to the holy word Allahu Akbar in Islam. As a result, the Pokemon movie is considered to be infiltrated with messages against religious teachings. The document also states that the banning of Pokemon in Iraq was carried out as a measure to prevent the entry of Jewish influences into the nation's children and culture. From Wikipedia, Syriac or Syrian is a language used by the Christian community in the Middle East. Syriac is different from Syrian dialect Arabic although Syriac influences Arabic. Syrian Christian minorities living in eastern Turkey, northern Iraq and northeastern Syria, are among those who speak this language.
berita_id: Dua atau lebih kata yang memiliki bentuk yang sama, tetapi memiliki makna yang berbeda dalam bahasa yang berbeda tidak dapat diremehkan (lihat juga: Nokia Lumia Apa artinya?).Banyak konsekuensi muncul karena perbedaan makna.Ada beberapa contoh.Di Irak, misalnya, kartun Pokemon dilarang selama masa pemerintahan Saddam Hussein.Kartun itu dibuat di Jepang dan disiarkan di Indonesia melalui stasiun televisi MNC TV.Fakta larangan itu diungkapkan melalui dokumen negara Irak yang disita oleh pasukan AS pada tahun 2004. Serambinews.com, seperti dikutip dari Dailymirror, mengatakan bahwa alasan larangan itu semata -mata karena makna negatifnya dalam bahasa di Irak.Dalam dokumen tersebut, Saddam menerima saran dari Badan Intelijen Negara bahwa nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film -film Pokemon tidak dapat ditoleransi dalam meremehkan Irak.Di Syria, atau di Indonesia lebih dikenal sebagai Syria, kata 'pokemon' sangat mirip dengan istilah yang sama dalam bahasa yang berarti: 'Saya Yahudi'.Beberapa karakter dalam film Pokemon, ketika diterjemahkan ke dalam Syria, juga memiliki makna yang tidak dapat diterima Saddam.Karakter utama film Pokemon, yaitu Pikachu, memiliki artinya: 'Jadilah orang Yahudi'.Kemudian, karakter Charmander, memiliki arti: 'Tuhan itu lemah', berbeda dengan Firman Suci Allahu Akbar dalam Islam.Akibatnya, film Pokemon dianggap diinfiltrasi dengan pesan -pesan yang menentang ajaran agama.Dokumen itu juga menyatakan bahwa pelarangan Pokemon di Irak dilakukan sebagai langkah untuk mencegah masuknya pengaruh Yahudi ke dalam anak -anak dan budaya negara.Dari Wikipedia, Syria atau Suriah adalah bahasa yang digunakan oleh komunitas Kristen di Timur Tengah.Syria berbeda dari dialek Suriah Arab meskipun Syria memengaruhi bahasa Arab.Minoritas Kristen Suriah yang tinggal di Turki Timur, Irak utara dan Suriah timur laut, adalah di antara mereka yang berbicara bahasa ini.

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently endemic craze and increasingly popular with netizens throughout Indonesia and the world A question was asked to our editor Is playing Pokemon Go Game according to Islam halal or haram As an introduction Pokemon Go is an augmentedrealitybased game developed by the Pokemon Company in collaboration with Niantic and Nintendo How to play someone uses a smartphone both Android and iOS to hunt Pokemon monsters With Android or iOS smartphone devices users can hunt Pokemon monsters in the real world for example in rivers mountains streets offices markets supermarkets lakes and other places So Pokemon monsters seem to exist and hide in the real world that can be seen through your cellphone screen Users are also busy hunting Pokemon monsters around them In fact some of them deliberately venture here and there to places where there are Pokemon monsters such as Pikachu Bulbasaur Charmander Squirtle and so on game pokemon go according to islam Suddenly many children teenagers and adults are addicted to the Pokemon Go game and are pacing around busy playing hunting monsters In fact there are journalists on the sidelines of their coverage hunting Pokemon monsters before waiting for sources Pokemon Go game according to Islam To answer this question the editor of Islamcendekiacom held a study and limited discussion From the results of this study we state that the Pokemon Go game can be legalpermissible or illegalprohibited Heres the explanation Sunni scholars agree that the main sources of Islamic law are the Quran and the Sunnah Hadith of the Prophet Meanwhile the sources of law that are still being debated by scholars include ijma qiyas ijtihad istihsan urf maslahah mursalah and so on Pokemon Go game is clearly not regulated in the Quran and Hadith That way we use the maslahah mursalah basis in answering the question of whether the game is haram or halal From the aspect of its application it is clear that the law was initially allowed However when the game appears harmful has a bad impact on someone then the law becomes haram or not allowed In this context for example forgetting the obligation to pray because they are busy hunting Pokemon monsters or being lazy to work decreased work productivity children are reluctant to study and so on Because being too busy playing the Pokemon Go Game which wastes time even interferes with the concentration of learning and childrens development is part of the devil So it is not wrong when an Ulema Council in Egypt forbids the game As quoted from the Mirror Deputy Head of Al Azhar Egypt Abbas Shuman likened the Pokemon Go game to alcohol which is prohibited in Islam Because monster hunting activities are considered like drunk people on the streets People become on the streets with their eyes glued to their cellphone screens looking for locations where imaginary Pokemon monsters are They are masses also busy capturing something imaginary or imaginary In fact some people even neglect work to

berita: Some time ago, social media was enlivened by a status shared by a netizen about a toothbrush that was allegedly made of sea urchins. What caught the attention of the netizens was the words "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging which in cash made netizens ask whether it is true that the toothbrush cannot be said to be a halal product??? This stems from an article about a previously circulated sea urchin brush, which can be seen on the LPPOM MUI website: The article states that the handles of boar-bristle brushes often have the words: Bristle, PureBristle, 100% China Bristle, and so on. One of the meanings of the word Bristle is Pig Hair or sea urchins (Webster's Dictionary) which are unclean when wet." The use of the word ONE in the article turned out to be misunderstood by some netizens who generalized the notion of "bristle" with sea urchins. In fact, if we explore further, the notion of "bristle" is much more general than just sea urchins. Bristle is a stiff/strong fiber or fur, either natural derived from plant fibers and animal hair or artificial (synthetic). From this definition, the word "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging does not necessarily make the toothbrush come from sea urchins. This means that the toothbrush could have come from other animal hair, plant fibers or even synthetic bristles. If we look back at the history and development of toothbrushes, the bristles found on toothbrushes originally came from wild boar bristles (Siberian). However, along with the development of technology, in 1938 toothbrushes were produced with nylon bristles which still dominate today. However, it is undeniable that there are still around 10% worldwide of toothbrush products whose bristles come from pig bristles. After we understand the true definition of bristle, then how do we know whether the toothbrush comes from non-halal fibers/bristles? A simple way is to look for information on the official website of the toothbrush manufacturer, or even ask directly to the customer service center. The rapid flow of information on social media makes us have to be more careful in disseminating information. If we have not been able to find valid information, it would be better if the information is asked in a forum that is related to the information. Information about the halalness of a product, of course, not only food/beverage/cosmetic but also lifestyle and thought, becomes a very important part in the life of a Muslim because it has an impact on matters of worship and the hereafter. Indeed, halal and haram matters are not only the responsibility of the MUI or the government but our business as Muslims. Therefore, Halal Corner invites Muslims to join the community of halal fighters. Halal Corner is a community that was established as a forum for active communication / sharing about various halal products, especially in the local area as well as providing halal counseling and education for Muslims in the form of training, halal campaigns, and educational activities that build public awareness of the importance of halal products. . Let's make halal modus vivendi a part of our lives.

Salah satu makna dari kata-kata yang tidak ada di bawah.Penggunaan kata satu dalam artikel itu ternyata disalahpahami oleh beberapa netizen yang menggeneralisasi gagasan "bulu" dengan landak laut.Bahkan, jika kita mengeksplorasi lebih lanjut, gagasan "bulu" jauh lebih umum daripada sekadar bulu babi.Bristle adalah serat atau bulu yang kaku/kuat, baik yang berasal dari serat tanaman dan rambut hewan atau buatan (sintetis).Dari definisi ini, kata "bulu" pada kemasan sikat gigi tidak selalu membuat sikat gigi berasal dari bulu babi.Ini berarti bahwa sikat gigi bisa berasal dari rambut hewan lain, serat tanaman atau bahkan bulu sintetis.Jika kita melihat kembali sejarah dan pengembangan sikat gigi, bulu yang ditemukan pada sikat gigi awalnya berasal dari bulu babi liar (Siberian).Namun, seiring dengan pengembangan teknologi, pada tahun 1938 sikat gigi diproduksi dengan bulu nilon yang masih mendominasi sampai sekarang.Namun, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa masih ada sekitar 10% di seluruh dunia dari produk sikat gigi yang bulunya berasal dari bulu babi.Setelah kita memahami definisi bulu yang sebenarnya, lalu bagaimana kita tahu apakah sikat gigi berasal dari serat/bulu non-halal?Cara sederhana adalah mencari informasi di situs web resmi produsen sikat gigi, atau bahkan meminta langsung ke pusat layanan pelanggan.Aliran informasi yang cepat di media sosial membuat kita harus lebih berhati -hati dalam menyebarkan informasi.Jika kami belum dapat menemukan informasi yang valid, akan lebih baik jika informasi ditanyakan di forum yang terkait dengan informasi tersebut.Informasi tentang hal halnya suatu produk, tentu saja, tidak hanya makanan/minuman/kosmetik tetapi juga gaya hidup dan pemikiran, menjadi bagian yang sangat penting dalam kehidupan seorang Muslim karena memiliki dampak pada masalah ibadah dan akhirat.Memang, hal -hal halal dan haram bukan hanya tanggung jawab MUI atau pemerintah tetapi juga bisnis kita sebagai Muslim.Oleh karena itu, halal Corner mengundang umat Islam untuk bergabung dengan komunitas pejuang halal.Halal Corner adalah komunitas yang didirikan sebagai forum untuk komunikasi aktif / berbagi tentang berbagai produk halal, terutama di daerah setempat serta menyediakan konseling halal dan pendidikan untuk umat Islam dalam bentuk pelatihan, kampanye halal, dan kegiatan pendidikan yang membangun kesadaran publik tentang pentingnya produk halal..Mari jadikan halal modus vivendi bagian dari kehidupan kita.

berita: Rumors of a riot at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, circulated on social media, Friday, November 10, 2017. The news became netizens' consumption and spread virally on virtual media. Information received by Criminology, Friday, November 10, 2017, through the short message application Whatsapp, a screenshot of the text informing that the riot occurred because the guard officer named Ahmad threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. #Updates #mako_brimob #riot There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. Until now, the rioting at the Brimob Command Headquarters is still ongoing, 3 blocks burned and all the doors destroyed, pray for our brothers and sisters who are being held captive at the Brimob Command Headquarters. #AlfathChannel Brimob Mako riot Based on criminology searches on social media, a number of accounts also uploaded the information by including several videos. A Facebook account called Aswaja Garis Lurus uploaded a video related to the riots. The uploaded 2 minute 4 second video shows the messy atmosphere in the prison room and a number of prisoners screaming. Some of them chant takbir. Since the video was uploaded, within an hour it has been viewed by more than 10 thousand accounts and shared by 645 Facebook users. Meanwhile, another Facebook account claiming to be named Lone Wolf also uploaded a similar video. In the video, you can see the atmosphere in the detention room. The detainees shouted and said that they did not want the Koran to be treated indiscriminately. Brimob Mako riot The 1 minute 27 second video shows the atmosphere outside the detention room. They shouted takbir and saw two black flags with the symbol of ISIS affixed to the prison wall. Some prisoners were also seen carrying wood and breaking windows. Regarding the circulation of information and videos, the Karo Penmas of the Public Relations Division of the Police, Brigadier General Pol Rikwanto, confirmed it. His party confirmed that there was a commotion at the Mako Bimob terrorist detention center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java. In a written statement received by Criminology, Friday, November 10, 2017, Rikwanto stated that on Friday, November 10, 2017, at around 16.00 WIB there had been a commotion at the Mako Korbrimob terrorist detention center, Salemba detention center. He explained that the commotion was carried out by terrorist prisoners which resulted in the destruction of the prison facilities. "It's like the door of the prison cell being broken down, the gate of the Block hallway, the window panes (in block C and block B)," said Rikwanto. In the written statement, Rikwanto also mentioned the facts found by the police in the incident. Here are the facts revealed by the police. 1. That it is true that after Friday prayers the prisoners were put into their respective cells. After entering the picket cell, the Densus removed the key in rooms A5 and C5 (RB) because there was a key slot from the inside. For the sake of enwrapped security and make it easier for the picket officer to open the cell door. 2. That it is true that while carrying out these activities, the Densus picket carried out a search in the room and found 4 cellphones belonging to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam and Jumali. 3. That it is true that with the examination activities one of the detainees did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words. Then there are members who are provoked by their words. And there is a prisoner who while takbir loudly so that it provokes the prisoner of the block next to it. 4. The picket members from Sat III Pioneer took action by shooting upwards to indicate a loss occurred and to give warnings to the inmates. 5. Until now the atmosphere has been suppressed by the Densus picket, after that the members are on standby in the picket while waiting for developments, but the prisoners still have takbir-takbir which triggers others. 6. The steps taken by AKP Ahmat as the Wartah Head are coordinating with Brimob colleagues to back up Pam Rutan Salemba.
berita_id: Rumor kerusuhan di markas Komando Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, beredar di media sosial, Jumat, 10 November 2017. Berita itu menjadi konsumsi netizen dan menyebar secara viral di media virtual.Informasi yang diterima oleh Criminology, Jumat, 10 November 2017, melalui aplikasi pesan pendek WhatsApp, tangkapan layar teks yang menginformasikan bahwa kerusuhan itu terjadi karena petugas penjaga bernama Ahmad melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk.#Updates #mako_brimob #riot Telah ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, dua depot di mana tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk.Sampai sekarang, kerusuhan di markas komando Brimob masih berlangsung, 3 blok terbakar dan semua pintu dihancurkan, berdoa untuk saudara -saudari kita yang ditahan di markas komando Brimob.#AlfathChannel Brimob Mako Riot Berdasarkan pencarian kriminologi di media sosial, sejumlah akun juga mengunggah informasi tersebut dengan memasukkan beberapa video.Akun Facebook bernama Aswaja Garis Lurus mengunggah video yang terkait dengan kerusuhan.Video 4 menit 4 detik yang diunggah menunjukkan suasana yang berantakan di ruang penjara dan sejumlah tahanan berteriak.Beberapa dari mereka melantunkan Takbir.Sejak video diunggah, dalam waktu satu jam telah dilihat oleh lebih dari 10 ribu akun dan dibagikan oleh 645 pengguna Facebook.Sementara itu, akun Facebook lain yang mengklaim bernama Lone Wolf juga mengunggah video serupa.Dalam video, Anda dapat melihat suasana di ruang penahanan.Para tahanan berteriak dan mengatakan bahwa mereka tidak ingin Alquran diperlakukan tanpa pandang bulu.Brimob Mako Riot Video 1 menit 27 detik menunjukkan suasana di luar ruang penahanan.Mereka meneriakkan Takbir dan melihat dua bendera hitam dengan simbol ISIS yang ditempelkan di dinding penjara.Beberapa tahanan juga terlihat membawa kayu dan memecahkan jendela.Mengenai sirkulasi informasi dan video, Karo Penmas dari Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi, Brigadir Jenderal Pol Rikwanto, mengkonfirmasi.Partainya mengkonfirmasi bahwa ada keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Bimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat.Dalam pernyataan tertulis yang diterima oleh Criminology, Jumat, 10 November 2017, Rikwanto menyatakan bahwa pada hari Jumat, 10 November 2017, sekitar pukul 16.00 yang telah terjadi keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Korbrimob, Pusat Penahanan Salemba.Dia menjelaskan bahwa keributan itu dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris yang mengakibatkan penghancuran fasilitas penjara."Ini seperti pintu sel penjara yang dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Dalam pernyataan tertulis, Rikwanto juga menyebutkan fakta -fakta yang ditemukan oleh polisi dalam insiden itu.Inilah fakta -fakta yang diungkapkan oleh polisi.1. Bahwa benar bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing.Setelah memasuki sel piket, densus melepas kunci di kamar A5 dan C5 (RB) karena ada slot kunci dari dalam.Demi keamanan yang diberkahi dan memudahkan petugas piket untuk membuka pintu sel.2. Memang benar bahwa saat melakukan kegiatan ini, piket densus melakukan pencarian di ruangan itu dan menemukan 4 ponsel milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam dan Jumali.3. Bahwa benar bahwa dengan kegiatan pemeriksaan salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi petugas dengan berbagai kata.Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka.Dan ada seorang tahanan yang sementara Takbir dengan keras sehingga memprovokasi tahanan blok di sebelahnya.4. Anggota piket dari perintis SAT III mengambil tindakan dengan menembak ke atas untuk menunjukkan kerugian terjadi dan memberikan peringatan kepada para tahanan.5. Sampai sekarang suasananya telah ditekan oleh piket Densus, setelah itu para anggota siaga di piket sambil menunggu perkembangan, tetapi para tahanan masih memiliki Takbir-Takbir yang memicu orang lain.6. Langkah -langkah yang diambil oleh AKP Ahmat sebagai kepala Wartah berkoordinasi dengan rekan -rekan Brimob untuk mendukung Pam Rutan Salemba.

berita: Jakarta, to carry out actions to defend Islam and the State that will be carried out by the Muslim community, is a member of the Islamic Community Forum (FUI), which is already stifled by the behavior of the leaders of this country, where they should carry out the rules and laws firmly and correctly, but in reality they do not. thereby. This assumption led to the case of blasphemy against Islam carried out by the defendant Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, who is currently undergoing trial, it was not dismissed and the public considered that the reasons given seemed made up. Not even a few legal and state administration experts, including the former Chief Justice of the Constitutional Court, Mahfud MD, also criticized the government's attitude, especially the Minister of Home Affairs (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo including President Joko Widodo alias Jokowi who was silent when Ahok was again given his seat as governor. While some regional heads actually experience the opposite. As a result, their demands in the action called the Action to Defend Islam and the State 212 will be carried out in front of the MPR building of the DPR RI, and apparently not a few participants came from several outside Jakarta. As a result, they tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque with the intention of carrying out the Fajr prayer in congregation, and also the weather conditions when this news was revealed were raining, as a result they tried to immediately enter shelter while waiting for the prayer time to enter. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal Mosque is actually tightly closed, as received by this media, in the form of photos and descriptions, 5 minutes later when this news was revealed, the participants were also unable to enter to gather and perform the dawn prayer. "Istiqlal Mosque in Padlock no one can (may) fill pray Fajr. What regime is this.. PKI challenges the Defenders of Islam.our war begins (Starts) Allahu Akbar..! Thus the contents of the text in the description of the photo sent to this media. It can be seen in the photo that the participants are gathering and hoping that the door will be opened soon. Their anger was directed at the government, because the Istiqlal Mosque is managed directly under the Ministry of Religion through the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI). Where the management of BPPMI is appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who is also in the structure as Chairman of BPPMI. Meanwhile, the responsibility is directly to the President. Meanwhile, it is related to the statement that mentions the involvement of the PKI, due to the connection with the PDI-P as the ruling party and also the main supporter of President Jokowi and also the DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot. And in PDIP itself, it is known that many generations of PKI leaders from the 1960s have filled it. And do not cover themselves even boldly and proudly they admit it. As once said by Member of the Indonesian House of Representatives Commission IX from PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, when interviewed and published by one of the media, on September 30, 2015.
berita_id: Jakarta, untuk melakukan tindakan untuk membela Islam dan negara yang akan dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim, adalah anggota Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI), yang sudah tertahan oleh perilaku para pemimpin negara ini, di mana mereka harus melaksanakan aturan dan hukum dengan kuat dan benar, tetapi pada kenyataannya mereka tidak melakukannya.dengan demikian.Asumsi ini mengarah pada kasus penistaan terhadap Islam yang dilakukan oleh terdakwa Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, yang saat ini sedang menjalani persidangan, itu tidak diberhentikan dan publik mempertimbangkan bahwa alasan yang diberikan tampaknya dibuat.Bahkan beberapa pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan Ketua Pengadilan Konstitusi, Mahfud MD, juga mengkritik sikap pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo termasuk Presiden Joko Widodo Alias Jokowi yang diam ketika Ahok lagi diberi kursi sebagai gubernur.Sementara beberapa kepala regional benar -benar mengalami sebaliknya.Akibatnya, tuntutan mereka dalam tindakan yang disebut tindakan untuk membela Islam dan Negara 212 akan dilakukan di depan gedung MPR DPR RI, dan tampaknya tidak sedikit peserta yang datang dari beberapa di luar Jakarta.Akibatnya, mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal dengan maksud melaksanakan doa Fajr di jemaat, dan juga kondisi cuaca ketika berita ini terungkap hujan, sebagai akibatnya mereka mencoba untuk segera memasuki tempat berlindung sambil menunggu waktu sholat masuk.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal sebenarnya ditutup rapat, seperti yang diterima oleh media ini, dalam bentuk foto dan deskripsi, 5 menit kemudian ketika berita ini terungkap, para peserta juga tidak dapat masuk untuk berkumpul dan melakukan doa fajar."Masjid Istiqlal di gembok  Tidak ada yang bisa (mungkin) mengisi doa fajr .... rezim apa ini ..... PKI menantang para pembela Islam .... Perang kita dimulai (dimulai) ... Allahu Akbar ...!"Dengan demikian isi teks dalam deskripsi foto yang dikirim ke media ini.Dapat dilihat di foto bahwa para peserta berkumpul dan berharap pintu akan segera dibuka.Kemarahan mereka diarahkan pada pemerintah, karena masjid Istiqlal dikelola langsung di bawah Kementerian Agama melalui Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI).Di mana manajemen BPPMI ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.Sementara itu, tanggung jawabnya langsung kepada Presiden.Sementara itu, ini terkait dengan pernyataan yang menyebutkan keterlibatan PKI, karena hubungan dengan PDI-P sebagai partai yang berkuasa dan juga pendukung utama Presiden Jokowi dan juga DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot.Dan dalam PDIP sendiri, diketahui bahwa banyak generasi pemimpin PKI dari tahun 1960 -an telah mengisinya.Dan jangan menutupi diri mereka bahkan dengan berani dan bangga mereka mengakuinya.Seperti yang pernah dikatakan oleh anggota Komisi IX Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia dari PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, ketika diwawancarai dan diterbitkan oleh salah satu media, pada 30 September 2015.

berita: Dozens of terrorism detainees at the Salemba detention center branch of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Kelapa Dua went on a rampage Friday (10/11). This is call thought to have occurred because of the mobile phone raid on terrorism detainees. However, there is information circulating that there is a throwing of the Koran in the prison. There is a video circulating in the video that shows dozens of prisoners screaming. They came out of the holding cell. Several prisoners were seen clenching their fists. Screams were heard. In another video, several prisoners can be seen kicking at the cell door, some are carrying a wooden door that has been released. Some of the prisoners wore t-shirts. From outside the cell, a number of police officers were seen trying to calm the angry prisoners. It is possible that the video came from the prisoners' cellphones. Because, the angle of the video is in the detention cell. Not from outside the cell at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters. Head of the General Information Section (Kabagpenum) of the National Police Divhumas Kombespol Martinus Sitompul said that the issue of the throwing of the Koran in the detention center was not true. "However, the cause of the riot was only the raid on cellphones owned by prisoners of terrorism cases," he explained. Initially, the officers examined the objects and books that were in the detention cell. That's when the prisoners went on a rampage because some of them had cellphones. During the rampage, the cell door was damaged, the turmoil was only in Blocks B and C," he explained. According to him, the current condition of the prison is conducive. The prisoners are already in a calm condition. "It doesn't continue, everything is safe," explained the former Head of the Polda Metro Jaya Head of Public Relations. It should be noted that most of the detainees in terrorism cases are being held at the Salemba Rutan at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters branch, Kelapa Dua. In fact, there is Amir Jamaah Ansharut Daulah (JAD) Aman Abdurrahman, who some time ago was immediately picked up by the Anti-Terror Detachment 88 when he was released from the Nusakambangan White Sand Prison.
berita_id: Lusinan tahanan terorisme di Cabang Pusat Penahanan Salemba dari Markas Besar Brigade Mobile Kelapa Dua mengamuk Jumat (10/11).Ini adalah panggilan yang dianggap terjadi karena serangan ponsel pada tahanan terorisme.Namun, ada informasi yang beredar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran di penjara.Ada video yang beredar dalam video yang menunjukkan lusinan tahanan berteriak.Mereka keluar dari sel penahan.Beberapa tahanan terlihat mengepal tinju mereka.Jeritan terdengar.Dalam video lain, beberapa tahanan terlihat menendang di pintu sel, beberapa membawa pintu kayu yang telah dilepaskan.Beberapa tahanan mengenakan t-shirt.Dari luar sel, sejumlah petugas polisi terlihat berusaha menenangkan para tahanan yang marah.Mungkin saja video itu berasal dari ponsel tahanan.Karena, sudut video ada di sel penahanan.Bukan dari luar sel di markas perintah brigade seluler.Kepala Bagian Informasi Umum (Kabagpenum) dari Kepolisian Nasional divhumas Kombespol Martinus Sitompul mengatakan bahwa masalah pelemparan Alquran di pusat penahanan tidak benar."Namun, penyebab kerusuhan hanyalah serangan di ponsel yang dimiliki oleh para tahanan kasus terorisme," jelasnya.Awalnya, para petugas memeriksa benda dan buku yang ada di sel penahanan.Saat itulah para tahanan mengamuk karena beberapa dari mereka memiliki ponsel.Selama mengamuk, pintu sel rusak, kekacauan itu hanya di blok B dan C, "jelasnya. Menurutnya, kondisi penjara saat ini kondusif. Para tahanan sudah dalam kondisi yang tenang." Tidak berlanjut, semuanya aman, "jelas mantan Kepala Polda yang di dalamnya, kepala detor di atas raih di atas.Cabang Markas Besar Brigade, Kelapa Dua.
